name: onboarding-system
description: Create comprehensive onboarding system for CLI, Web, and Chat
verification: Created multi-channel onboarding: CLI wizard (lib/onboard.sh) with interactive steps, quick auto-setup, status check. Web UI modal with feature showcase, activate workstation button, start daemon button. Both persist completion state. Commands: autonomy onboard, autonomy onboard quick, autonomy onboard status.
evidence: Web UI onboarding modal with 2-step setup
Feature showcase grid (Agentic AI, Task Management, Scheduling, Metrics)
Quick setup command tested and working
